content: BOUNTY IS OVERâœï¸ Altava Bounty Distribution Informationâ™¦ï¸ Altava's bounty allocation of 3,500 BUSD has been successfully distributed by Bounty Detective team. Therefore, the bounty distribution is completed. You can check your bounty balance here.â™¦ï¸ Follow up-to-date information about the Altava project by joining their Telegram Group.â–â–â–â–â–â–â–â–â–âœ”ï¸ ALL DISTRIBUTED BOUNTIESğŸ“ƒ Page 1ğŸ“ƒ Page 2ğŸ“ƒ Page 3ğŸ“ƒ Page 4ğŸ“ƒ Page 5â™¦ï¸ You can participate in the ongoing bounties on our Telegram channel.Kind Regards, Â Bounty Detective Team â˜… WEBSITE â˜… TELEGRAM â˜… TWITTER â˜… DISCORD â˜…  INSTAGRAM â˜… WHITEPAPER â˜… YOUTUBE â˜…____________________________________________TAVA is available on,  ____________________________________________1. The Bounty campaign will be managed by Bounty Detective.Â 2. 3,500 BUSD tokens are to be divided according to the stakes accumulatedamongst selected participants.3. The bounty program was launched on January 27th, 2023 and will run until March 9th, 2023.4. The reward distribution of ALTAVA Bounty is guaranteed by Bounty Detective.The distribution will begin on 30th March, 2023.______________________Disclaimer: By agreeing to participate in this bounty, you acknowledge that the wallet address and the email address you submitted are final and can't be changed.Bounty Detective may perform additional reviews, including but not limited to requesting other documentation for analysis of your joined campaigns if needed.Bounty Detective is under no obligation to send your bounty reward and may, at its discretion, cancel your participation from each ongoing bounty if the participant does not follow the rules mentioned on this bounty thread.Bounty Detective has no contribution to the token distribution; unless it announces the exact opposite on group and channel. We are only responsible for the reward distribution of any campaign when we publish it, unless explicitly stated "Bounty Detective has escrowed and guarantees the reward distribution of this bounty." The USD value of the bounty reward pool is estimated, and it might change regarding different factors. We usually announce the rewards by calculating their final token sale price if it is not listed on any exchange yet.Our team has carefully researched the project following several criteria as we did for all of the campaigns we have managed or published. However, we can't assure the project's success as our duty is to provide a bounty management service for them as freelancers. We are responsible only for managing the campaign. We are not responsible for the project's success and continuity.A crypto project has too many factors in reaching their targets. We are not in the team of any project and not their employees, and we can't guarantee the future progress of any project only because we manage their bounty as freelancers.Â We encourage everyone to do their research and due diligence before investing their time or money. Participating in this bounty campaign or investing in it will be at your own risk.Kind regards.______________________1. All participants must join AlTava's official Telegram Group, Telegram Channel and Discord Channel.2. All participants must join Bounty Detective's Telegram Group, Telegram Channel,mTwitter and YouTube Channel.3. Talking about the bounty program in the project chat group will lead to immediate disqualification from the campaign and an instant ban from the company chat group. Please ask your bounty-related questions in the Bounty Detective's Group.4. KYC is not required for the bounty campaign. However, the project's team has the right to require KYC for suspicious cases.5. Please note that any offensive or inappropriate behavior will lead to immediate disqualification from the campaign.6. Using multiple accounts, cheating and spamming are not allowed. You will be disqualified from the bounty program immediately and all your accounts will be banned permanently. Brand new accounts are not allowed to join.7. Participants with a minimum of 100+ activity counts on Bitcointalk will be eligible to join the social media campaigns, while 35+ activity counts on the Article and Video campaigns.8. Participants can not change their wallet address after registration. Please double check your wallet address before registration for any campaign.9. Participantsâ€™ forum accounts should be at least 3 months old prior to participating in the Article and Video campaign.10. Article and Video submission form will be closed 3 days before the end of the bounty.11. Negative Trusted Accounts may be allowed into this Campaign if the reason for red trust is libel or unjustifiable.Final Decision is at the Bounty manager's discretion if you have a massively red trusted account or acquire too many negatives during the campaign, you accept the risk that you might be eventually removed and your stakes voided.12. All participants must send the Proof of Authentication post to join the bounty program.13. All participants have to submit their weekly reports (for social campaigns) on this bounty thread. Stakes will be calculated on a weekly basis. For each week, you are required to make new reports. Edited reports and POA will not be counted.Proof Of Registration Format (All participants must send 1 time):Code:#PROOF OF REGISTRATIONForum Username:Forum Profile Link:Telegram Username:Participated Campaigns:BSC Wallet Address:Weekly Report Format:Code:Week: Bitcointalk Username:Telegram Username:[b]Twitter Campaign[/b]Twitter Profile Url:Spreadsheet No:Retweets/Tweets Url:1. â€¦2. â€¦3. â€¦4. â€¦5. â€¦[b]Telegram Campaign[/b]Telegram Username:Spreadsheet No:Telegram posts Url:1. â€¦2. â€¦3. â€¦4. â€¦5. â€¦[b]Discord Campaign[/b]Discord Username:Spreadsheet No:DIscord posts Url:1. â€¦2. â€¦3. â€¦4. â€¦5. â€¦[b]Short Video Campaign[/b]Tiktok Username:Spreadsheet No:Short Videos Url:1. â€¦2. â€¦3. â€¦Twitter Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â 20%Telegram Â  Â  Â  Â  Â 12%Discord Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  12%Short Video Â  Â  Â 08%Article Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  16%Video Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â 08%Signature Â  Â  Â  Â  Â 24%Note:  Due to the bounty duration and pool, we have limited the number of participants for this bounty.Twitter: Â First 300 approved participants.Telegram: First 250 approved participants.Discord: First 200 approved participants.Short Video: First 150 approved participants.Article: Top 50 articles will be selected.Video: First 30 approved participants.Bitcointalk: First 1/1 approved Legendary member, 2/2 Hero Members and 2/2 Senior members.--> Please submit your weekly report on this bounty thread <--Week 1 (27.01 - 02.02)Week 2 (03.02 - 09.02)Week 3 (10.02 - 16.02)Week 4 (17.02 - 23.02)Week 5 (24.02 - 02.03)Week 6 (03.03 - 09.03)--> If you have any problem regarding missing stakes, please fill the form below <--Complaint FormComplaint SpreadsheetNote: Complaints will be checked once in every week.Rewards:  1. Have more than 501 followers: 1 stake/week2. Have more than 1501 followers: 2 stakes/week3. Have more than 5001 followers: 3 stakes/week4. Have more than 10,001 followers: 4 stakes/weekRules: Â 1. Every participant must follow ALTAVAâ€™s Twitter Page.2. Twitter accounts must have a minimum of 501 followers.3. Participants have to make new tweets or retweet 5 tweets per week (maximum 1 retweets/day).4. Time gap between 2 retweets/tweets needs to be 10 hours minimum.5. Participants must use $TAVA #altava #altavagroup #NFT#web3 #metaverse hashtags in every retweet or tweet.6. At least 1 tweet/retweet in each week must include BIB Exchangeâ€™swebsite: https://altava.com/How to join:1. Join ALTAVAâ€™s official Telegram Group, Telegram Channel and Twitter.2. Join Bounty Detective's Telegram Group, Telegram Channel and Twitter.3. Fill the registration form: https://forms.gle/f7vezjkEGrySGn6q7Rewards:5 stakes/weekRules:1. Update your Telegram name to Your Name | ALTAVA.(Example: BountyDetective | ALTAVA)2. Replace your profile picture with ALTAVA's Logo.3. Participants can only wear one project name at a time. Wearing more than one project in your telegram name will disqualify you from the campaign.4. Your telegram username must be visible to all while in the community. You must interact with the Telegram account with which you have registered the campaign. Violation of this rule will lead to the removal of all earned stakes.5. Write at least 5 constructive messages in top exchangeâ€™s telegram groups (Example: Binance, Kucoin, Gate.io, MEXC etc). Posting messages on other groups wonâ€™t be counted.6. Spam or Deleted messages will not be counted. Hashtags "#" are not allowed in the conversation.7. Report your telegram message links weekly. Please obey the report dates and format.8. You must stay in the telegram group until the end of the campaign to receive your stakes.9. You must wear ALTAVA's avatar and text until the end of the campaign to receive your stakes.How to join:1. Join ALTAVAâ€™s official Telegram Group, Telegram Channel and Twitter.2. Join Bounty Detective's Telegram Group, Telegram Channel and Twitter.3. Fill the registration form: https://forms.gle/7V4X2q1Z8Lpe8SYB6Rewards:5 stakes/weekRules:1. Every participant must join ALTAVAâ€™s Discord Channel.2. Participants have to interact with each other on ALTAVAâ€™s Discord channel.3. Participants have to write 5 constructive messages with each other per week (maximum 1 retweet/day).4. Time gap between 2 messages needs to be 10 hours minimum.5. Meaningless,irrelevant messages or copy and pasting messages by changing the project name are not counted, tryto help other users by providing the correct information regarding the project. Either you can ask questions or help others with proper answers regarding the project.6. Please take the screenshot of your message and upload it on Imgur or similar websites.Then submit that link during report submission.How to join:1. Join ALTAVAâ€™s official Telegram Group, Telegram Channel and Twitter.2. Join Bounty Detective's Telegram Group, Telegram Channel and Twitter.3. Fill the registration form: https://forms.gle/FRfKLD6KFBooCmNc8Rewards:  1. Have more than 200 views: 1 stake/week2. Have more than 500 views: 2 stakes/week3. Have more than 2000 views: 3 stakes/week4. Have more than 5000 views: 4 stakes/week5. Have more than 10,000 views: 5 stakes/weekRules: Â 1. TikTok/Youtube Shorts/ Reels etc. accounts must have a minimum of 30 followers.2. Videos need to be unique and have at least 200 views to qualify. 3. Videos need to be a minimum of 20 secs in length. 4. Participant's short video contents must focus on a relevant topic about the project's features, latest project's token updates/development, etc.5. Participants have to shoot 3 unique videos per week (maximum 1 video/day).6. Participants must use TAVA #altava #altavagroup #NFT#web3 #metaverse hashtags in every video.How to join:1. Join ALTAVAâ€™s official Telegram Group, Telegram Channel and Twitter.2. Join Bounty Detective's Telegram Group, Telegram Channel and Twitter.3. Fill the registration form: https://forms.gle/zoEoqywV9NQLTcB16Rewards: Â High quality: 3 stakesGood quality: 2 stakesAverage quality: 1 stakeRules: Â 1. Each participant can write 1 article only.2. Articles should be quality and unique with a minimum of 500 words.(Participants who copy the project's website, whitepaper or ANN thread, will not receive rewards).Views and comments at least 10 likes/comments/upvotes or 100 claps would be taken note of.3. High engagements but poor quality articles will not be rewarded. Stakes will be awarded based on quality and the number of engagements with other criteria.4. Quality articles with less or no engagements will be rewarded accordingly.5. Participants' forum accounts should be at least 3 months old prior to participating in the article campaign.6. Articles should be published on blogs recommended by us: Steemit, Medium and LinkedIn and must be publicly accessible.7. Content must focus on a relevant topic: Project features, Staking / Liquidity rewards, Presale,Latest project's token updates, Blockchain, etc.8. Only quality and original content will be accepted. Removal/deletion will result in disqualification.9. Published Articles must include at least 2 images of the project, link to the Proof of Authentication, the project's website,Medium page, Twitter page, Telegram group, YouTube channel or any other social media.10. Please provide enough details of the writer at the end of the article to ensure authenticity. This will be verified!11. By joining this program, participants accept that the project's team can use all these articles as marketing materials.How to join:1. Join ALTAVAâ€™s official Telegram Group, Telegram Channel and Twitter.2. Join Bounty Detective's Telegram Group, Telegram Channel and Twitter.3. Fill the registration form: https://forms.gle/e8YsVhpro4RGrBfV7Note: Article submission will be closed 3 days before the end of the bounty.Rewards:  High quality: 3 stakes (High quality video and >5000 views)Good quality: 2 stakes (Good quality video and >2000 views )Average quality: 1 stake (Average quality video and >700 views)Rules: Â 1. Each participant can send 1 video only.2. Participants must have at least 700+ youtube subscribers. Videos need to be a minimum of 3 minutes in length.3. Participants' forum account should be at least 3 months old prior to participating in the video campaign.4. Video contents must focus on a relevant topic: project features, latest project's token updates, blockchain, etc.5. Only original video content will be accepted. Copy from the project website, YouTube channels or from others' work will be rejected.6. Face cam video will be highly recommended and considered. Video created with mobile devices and bot voices will not be rewarded.There will be slim considerations for good quality animation video with bot voices.7. High engagements but poor quality video will not be rewarded. Stakes will be awarded based on the number of engagements and quality.8. Videos should never be removed. Removal/deletion will result in disqualification.9. All videos need to have a link to the Proof of Authentication, project's website,Medium page, Twitter page, Telegram group, YouTube channel or any other social media.10. Please provide enough details of the producer (bounty hunter) at the end of the video to ensure authenticity. This will be verified!11. By joining this program, all participants accept that the project's team can use all these videos as marketing materials.How to join:1. Join ALTAVAâ€™s official Telegram Group, Telegram Channel and Twitter.2. Join Bounty Detective's Telegram Group, Telegram Channel and Twitter.3. Fill the registration form: https://forms.gle/eo3W7tQbtj4ac4h88Note: Video submission will be closed 3 days before the end of the bounty.Rewards: Sr. Member: $20 per weekHero Member: $30 per weekLegendary Member: $40 per weekRules: Â 1. Newbies and Junior Members are not allowed to join. Â 2. Avatar and Signature need to be used till the end of the campaign.3. Posts made on micro earnings, archival, bounty threads and off-topic willbe excluded. Max of 4 posts in local-boards will be counted towards your quota per week.4. Posts with less than 100 characters will not be counted as valid posts.5. Please make a minimum of 10 constructive posts weekly.6. Posts should be spread evenly across 4 days at least.7. Any kind of spam is not allowed.8. Bounty reports are not counted.9. Forum rank can not be updated after the registration.You can't modify or upgrade your rank once registered on the campaign.How to join:1. Join ALTAVAâ€™s official Telegram Group, Telegram Channel and Twitter.2. Join Bounty Detective's Telegram Group, Telegram Channel and Twitter.3.
